MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the  CH7 and CH8 postcode areas of Mold and Holywell, affecting properties in Nannerch, Babell and surrounding areas. Our emergency response team has managed to restore power to a number of properties, and we are working to restore power for those customers still off supply. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of further network investigations required  and our team are now working to get the power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 4:00AM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11:49Pm on 26th December 2020
